Topic.Title: Use your browser as a text editor

Posts.EditableText:
You can paste this into your browser's address bar and type away:

```data:text/html, <html contenteditable>```
Posts.HTML:
You can paste this into your browser's address bar and type away:

data:text/html, <html contenteditable>

Posts.EditableText:
Oh hey. It works on my Kindle!

I can use this for school! Before, I just typed things in an email! ...
Posts.HTML:
Oh hey. It works on my Kindle!

I can use this for school! Before, I just typed things in an email! ...

Posts.EditableText:
I know!

I just found it and thought it was pretty nifty!

---
NOTE: It doesn't save your draft automatically like Gmail does.  (It's hard to lose your important notes if you use your email.)
Posts.HTML:
I know!

I just found it and thought it was pretty nifty!

NOTE: It doesn't save your draft automatically like Gmail does. (It's hard to lose your important notes if you use your email.)
